description:
Startup Booster is a free pack of social media templates. Use it to boost your Product Hunt launch or to announce a product update ðŸ˜¸


The templates come in 3 formats: Instagram, Facebook/Twitter, and Product Hunt.


The current version of Startup Booster contains 29 files for a successful Product Hunt launch campaign. We plan to release more items for various events:


  • Black Friday (coming soon!)
  • Xmas
  • New Year
  • New blog post
  • Product Update
  • Anniversary
  • Giveaway
  • We are hiring
  • ...and much more!


Startup Booster is being developed by the Unicorn Platform team. Unicorn Platform is a simple landing page builder.


The illustrations were gladly provided by Craftwork. Craftwork is a premium design assets vendor.


License: MIT. Free for both commercial and personal use, no credits required.
